products.name: Elara Leather  Bag
products.description: Crafted from premium full-grain leather, the Elara Tote Bag combines style and functionality. Spacious enough for your essentials with a sleek design perfect for daily use or travel.

products.name: Luna Crossbody Bag
products.description: The Luna Crossbody Bag offers a chic, hands-free option for the modern woman. Featuring multiple compartments and an adjustable strap, it’s perfect for on-the-go organization.

products.name: Astra  Shoulder Bag
products.description: The Astra Quilted Shoulder Bag blends elegance with practicality. Its luxurious quilted finish and gold-tone hardware make it an ideal choice for both day and evening wear.

products.name: Vega Mini Satchel
products.description: Compact yet spacious, the Vega Mini Satchel is the perfect blend of style and convenience. Its structured design and top handle make it a versatile accessory for any outfit.

products.name: Seren Drawstring  Bag
products.description: The Seren Drawstring Bucket Bag offers a modern twist on a classic design. Its soft leather and adjustable strap make it both stylish and comfortable to carry.

products.name: Aurora Woven Clutch
products.description: The Aurora Woven Clutch is a statement piece, featuring intricate woven detailing and a sleek silhouette. Perfect for adding a touch of sophistication to any evening ensemble.

products.name: Stella  Backpack
products.description: The Stella Leather Backpack combines practicality with style. Made from durable leather with multiple pockets, it’s perfect for both work and weekend adventures.

products.name: Nova Convertible  Bag
products.description: The Nova Convertible Shoulder Bag offers versatility with its adjustable strap that allows it to be worn as a shoulder bag or crossbody. Its sleek design and roomy interior make it a must-have.
